title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Student-Centered Science Inquiry Using Mobile Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experimental methods (high school level)
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can decompose and explain the scientific experiment design process into three or more stages using mobile applications
Learners provide structured feedback on two or more submitted science inquiry reports through a peer assessment function
Learners quantitatively analyze five physics/chemistry phenomena using virtual simulation tools provided on a mobile learning platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
